text:
BANKRUPT STOCK!
BANKRUPT STOCK!

35 - LARGE CASES - 35

$15,000.00 WORTH OF DRY GOODS,
CLOTHING AND FUR GOODS.

The contents of one of the largest Dry Goods and Clothing Houses in Winnipeg,

BOUGHT AT 50 CENTS ON THE DOLLAR,
And we are determined to give our customers, far and near.

The Greatest Bargains ever offered in the City of Brandon.

Don't fail to impress the fact upon your memory that

YOU WILL RECEIVE LARGE PARCELS OF GOODS FOR SMALL SUMS OF MONEY

The Goods are all New and Fresh and bought within the last eighteen months especially for the Winnipeg trade.

Don't buy a dollar's worth of goods until you inspect this mammoth stock. We can sell you goods

25 Per Cent. Less Than Wholesale Prices.

A Big Sacrifice in Dress Goods, Trimmings, Ginghams, Muslins,
Embroideries, Curtains, Cretonnes, Towels and Toweling, Napkins, Table Linen, Table Oil Cloth, Cotton, cottonades, Oxford Shirting,
Factory Flannels, Gloves, Tweeds, and last

but not by any means least

Ready-Made Clothing and Gents' Furnishings.

We have in this Gigantic Stock $7,000 of Ready-Made Clothing, Under Clothing and Furnishings.

All to be Slaughtered at Bankrupt Prices.

We can give you a beautiful suit, sold in Winnipeg for $18.00, for $9.00; and suits sold for $1.00, for $.60; and
suits sold for $1.00, for $.80; and piles of them as low as $.40 a suit, all first-class goods.

In Pants we have 500 pair to choose from at from 75 cents up to $3.50, in Canadian and Scotch Tweed.

In White and Colored Shirts we have one hundred dozen from 5 cents each up to $.10. In Ties we have one complete case, bought for spring trade, direct from New York, which had never been opened, and
stacks of others from 5 cents each up to 9 cents, all to be cleaned out to anyone and
everyone that comes along and keeps coming while the stock lasts.

For you will get the greatest bargains and save Lots of Money.

BANKRUPT GOODS at
BANKRUPT PRICES.

Note the address,

SOMERVILLE & CO.
CRAIG'S OLD STAND, OPPOSITE QUEEN'S HOTEL.
